title: Picture (disambiguation)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Picture may refer to several drawings and portraits:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Picture (disambiguation)

Picture may refer to several drawings and portraits:

  • Portraits used in Construction which can be mounted in Quest Halls:
    • Elena (portrait)
    • King Arthur (portrait)
    • Giant Dwarf (portrait)
    • Miscellanians
    • The items used in creating the portraits:
      • Elena portrait
      • King Arthur portrait
      • Keldagrim portrait
      • Miscellanians portrait
  • Picture, a picture of Elena used in Plague City
  • The picture puzzle that players encounter in the Rogues' Den maze
  • One of three sketches of Castle Drakan that are made during Darkness of Hallowvale quest
    • Castle sketch 1
    • Castle sketch 2
    • Castle sketch 3
  • Book of portraiture, an instructional book on making portraits used in the Zogre Flesh Eaters quest
  • One of two portraits done of Sithik Ints during the Zogre Flesh Eaters quest
    • Sithik portrait, a drawing that is used to help the Bartender at the Dragon Inn identify him
    • Signed portrait, signed by the Dragon Inn Bartender acknowledging that he did, in fact, see Sithik Ints
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
'''Picture''' may refer to several drawings and portraits:

*Portraits used in [[Construction]] which can be mounted in [[Quest Hall]]s:
**[[Elena (portrait)]]
**[[King Arthur (portrait)]]
**[[Giant Dwarf (portrait)]]
**[[Miscellanians]]
**The items used in creating the portraits:
***[[Elena portrait]]
***[[King Arthur portrait]]
***[[Keldagrim portrait]]
***[[Miscellanians portrait]]
*[[Picture]], a picture of [[Elena]] used in [[Plague City]]
*The [[Tiles (Rogues' Den)|picture puzzle]] that players encounter in the [[Rogues' Den]] maze
*One of three sketches of [[Castle Drakan]] that are made during [[Darkness of Hallowvale]] quest
**[[Castle sketch 1]]
**[[Castle sketch 2]]
**[[Castle sketch 3]]
*[[Book of portraiture]], an instructional book on making portraits used in the [[Zogre Flesh Eaters]] quest
*One of two portraits done of [[Sithik Ints]] during the [[Zogre Flesh Eaters]] quest
**[[Sithik portrait]], a drawing that is used to help the [[Bartender (Dragon Inn)|Bartender]] at the [[Dragon Inn]] identify him
**[[Signed portrait]], signed by the Dragon Inn Bartender acknowledging that he did, in fact, see Sithik Ints

{{Disambig}}
